text: Richard Martin Lloyd Walters (born 14 January 1965), better known by his stage name, Slick Rick, is an English rapper and record producer from a Jamaican family. He is also known by the names MC Ricky D and Rick the Ruler. He is also known for wearing an eye patch when performing after he was blinded in his right eye from broken glass as an infant. He burst onto the rap scene in Doug E. Fresh & the Get Fresh Crew where he went by the stage name, MC Ricky D. == Discography == === Studio albums === Slick Rick has released 4 studio albums: Year Album 1988 The Great Adventures of Slick Rick 1991 The Ruler's Back 1994 Behind Bars 1999 The Art of Storytelling == References == ==Other websites== *Slick Rick's Myspace Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Black British musicians Category:English musicians Category:British rappers Category:Singers from London Category:Musicians from London Category:Rappers from New York (state)
title: Slick Rick
